name: Rupali Goyal
about: 10+ years of Operational Excellence with MBA in IT Operations, ISO27001 LA, COBIT5, ITIL V3, Prince2 Practitioner and Lean Six Sigma GB Certified

positions.subtitle: Deutsche Bank
positions.description: Work closely with the Business, Front Office IT, Risk IT, Controllers, Operations, RTB, CTB and counterparts globally towards planning, assessment of timeliness, completeness and accuracy of the data, specification of feeds, processing and testing. BCBS and ECB regulatory requirements, understanding Business requirements and FSD's and analyse data while providing strategic solutions in resolving data quality issues through Agile SAFe Framework. Evaluation and analysis of Credit risk exposures primary focus on the analysis, specification, design and implementation of Credit risk feeds. Traded product & Commercial Banking credit exposure measurement techniques and their application across the range of financial instruments. Credit Risk Management , Credit Model Development (PD, LGD, EAD), RWA reporting. Work on identifying , investigating, analysing and proposing Strategic and Tactical solutions for data breaks.
